body:
Can you connect to servers from the public servers list?

Does the ping and users count display in the server connect dialog display?
No it isn't. Not sure why, all the information is correct

Can you connect to servers from the public server list?

Did you try disabling QoS? Some faulty routers have problems with it.

I’d suspect some issue in your networking infrastructure then.

QoS?



On Sat, Aug 17, 2013 at 5:20 AM, Kissaki <kissaki@users.sf.net> wrote:

> Can you connect to servers from the public server list?
>
> Did you try disabling QoS? Some faulty routers have problems with it.
>
> I’d suspect some issue in your networking infrastructure then.
> ------------------------------
>
> * [bugs:#1026] <http://sourceforge.net/p/mumble/bugs/1026/> Can't connect
> to any Server*
>
> *Status:* open
> *Created:* Wed Aug 14, 2013 07:35 PM UTC by Kyle Everett
> *Last Updated:* Sat Aug 17, 2013 02:28 AM UTC
> *Owner:* nobody
>
> A while ago Mumble was rejecting me from accessing a Server, and it kept
> saying that either the password was wrong (it wasn't) or my Username was
> wrong (it wasn't).
>
> But now, even when I select a Mumble Server, it won't even let me connect.
> The button is greyed out like I can't click it. I'm trying to access the
> World Nobles Server from a game site, and have been unable to for months.
> ------------------------------
>
> Sent from sourceforge.net because you indicated interest in
> https://sourceforge.net/p/mumble/bugs/1026/
>
> To unsubscribe from further messages, please visit
> https://sourceforge.net/auth/subscriptions/
>
